```{r echo=FALSE}
source("../bin/chunk-options.R")
```

```{r }
library(ggplot2)

knitr::kable(head(mtcars))
```

```{r mpg_vs_wt}
ggplot() + 
  geom_point(data = mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg))
```
